Armor of Safeguarding, Ring Mail.name: 安防护甲，环甲 Armor of Safeguarding, Ring Mail

Armor of Safeguarding, Plate.name: 安防护甲，板甲 Armor of Safeguarding, Plate
Armor of Safeguarding, Plate.description:
Set in the center of this armor’s chest is a citrine engraved with the shield rune.

While wearing this armor, your hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to 10 + your level.

Invoking the Rune. As an action, you can invoke the armor’s rune to cast the beacon of hope spell with it; the spell has a duration of 1 minute and doesn’t require &Reference[concentration]{concentration}. Once the rune has been invoked, it can’t be invoked again until the next dawn.
